## The Major
```{r flowChart}
MAT<-read_graph("MAT.ncol",format="ncol",directed=TRUE)
MAT<-union(MAT, read_graph("Majors/MAT.ncol",format="ncol",directed=TRUE))
MAT<-delete.vertices(MAT,c("MAT-091","MAT-110", "MAT-111","MAT-113", "MAT-117", "MAT-124", "MAT-115", "MAT-391", "MAT-Major"))
MAT<-add.edges(MAT,c("CIT-115","CIT-225"), weight=1)
layers<-list(c("MAT-Sr"), 
             c( "MAT-450", "MAT-460" ,"MAT-495", "MAT-Wing"),
             c("MAT-490",  "MAT-390"),
             c("High Math"),
             c( "MAT-370", "MAT-380", "MAT-395","MAT-220","MAT-310"),
             c("Upper Math"), 
 
             c(),

              c( "EDU-353", "CIT-225", "PHY-223"),
             c("MAT-230", "MAT-250", "MAT-260"),
             c("CIT-115", "MAT-150", "MAT-160"))

plot(MAT, layout=layout_with_sugiyama(MAT, layers=apply(sapply(layers,                                                               function(x) V(MAT)$name %in% x), 1, which))$layout)
```
